quest.name: Something to Sneeze At
journal: Ponnixia fears for the safety of the forest.

Explosives strewn about Larkscall by the malevolent sylphs of the Sylphlands threaten the safety of all who call the forest home, and only the formidable team of adventurer and goobbue can set things right. Speak to the amiable sylph in Larkscall and mount the great beast.
Few experiences are as exhilarating as a romp through the forest on goobbueback. But this is no time for idle recreation─employ the goobbue's sneeze to fling the sylphmade bombs into oblivion.
Thanks to the efforts of you and your oversized friend, Larkscall is safe once more. Inform Ponnixia that all is well.
Ponnixia is deeply grateful for your efforts on behalf of her people. She also envies your goobbue ride, expressing a desire to visit Larkscall in the near future so she might enjoy the same.
objectives: Speak with the amiable sylph in Larkscall and mount the goobbue.
Use your mount's Big Sneeze to destroy the bombs scattered about the Sylphlands.

dialogue.name: PONNIXIA
dialogue.text: Touched ones grow more dangerous by the day! What are these ones to do?

dialogue.name: PONNIXIA
dialogue.text: This one saw touched ones setting blast-bombs in Larkscall! Can friendly one believe it?

dialogue.name: PONNIXIA
dialogue.text: In seeking to protect the forest, touched ones only destroy it. This one weeps.

dialogue.name: PONNIXIA
dialogue.text: But tears will not save these ones' home. These ones must turn to our friends, mossy ones. Brave one is also friend to mossy ones, yes?

dialogue.name: PONNIXIA
dialogue.text: Mossy ones' ka-choo will blow touched ones' blast-bombs away. Amiable one in Larkscall knows friendly mossy one with big ka-choo. Brave one will make friends with that one, yes?

dialogue.name: PONNIXIA
dialogue.text: Mossy ones' ka-choo will blow touched ones' blast-bombs away. Amiable one in Larkscall knows friendly mossy one with big ka-choo. Brave one will make friends with that one, yes?

dialogue.name: NYXIA
dialogue.text: Ah, has friendly one come back to play with mossy one? Both ones are glad, this one and mossy one.

dialogue.name: NYXIA
dialogue.text: Touched ones have brought blast-bombs!? How frightful! Friendly one must be careful.

dialogue.name: NYXIA
dialogue.text: If walking one falls from mossy one, walking one should return to this one. Walking one will be riding one again.

dialogue.name: NYXIA
dialogue.text: Ah, has friendly one come back to play with mossy one? Both ones are glad, this one and mossy one.

dialogue.name: NYXIA
dialogue.text: Touched ones have brought blast-bombs!? How frightful! Please be careful, friendly one. This one could not bear to see this one's friend hurt.

dialogue.name: NYXIA
dialogue.text: (-Amiable Sylph-)Mossy one may look scary, but mossy one has gentle heart...until mossy one sees some one hurt mossy one's home. Then mossy one gets angry. Trust this one─no one wants to see mossy one angry.

dialogue.name: SYLPHENEMY
dialogue.text: These ones have angered mossy one! These ones must flee!

dialogue.name: SYLPHENEMY
dialogue.text: Our blast-bombs! Meddling one will pay for this!

dialogue.name: PONNIXIA
dialogue.text: Brave one and mossy one ka-chooed the blast-bombs out of Larkscall? Brave one is a true friend to the forest.

dialogue.name: PONNIXIA
dialogue.text: This one misses playing with mossy one. Perhaps next time, this one will go oneself!
